mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.shenhe_types as shenheTypes ,a.qingjia_number as qingjiaNumber ,a.qingjia_content as qingjiaContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM qingjia a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.shenhe_types = #{params.shenheTypes}
and a.qingjia_number >= #{params.qingjiaNumberStart}
and a.qingjia_number <= #{params.qingjiaNumberEnd}
and a.qingjia_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
